scripts.seed: docker-compose up -d dynamodb && npm run seed:init && npm run seed:apply && docker-compose stop dynamodb
scripts.seed:init: docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.tasks.yml run -w /terraform/db terraform init
scripts.seed:apply: docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.tasks.yml run -w /terraform/db terraform apply
scripts.deploy:init: docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.tasks.yml run terraform init || true
scripts.deploy:apply: docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.tasks.yml run terraform apply || true
scripts.lint: npm run lint:prettier && npm run lint:tflint
